gold.user: User wants to retrieve all documents from the 'myIndex' index to display them on the frontend of their application.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of documents in the 'myIndex' index.

gold.user: User needs to add a new document to the 'myIndex' index containing product details for an e-commerce application.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new document in the 'myIndex' index.

gold.user: User wants to update an existing document or create it if it doesn't exist in 'myIndex' to ensure the latest product information is available.
gold.ideal: Updates the existing document or creates a new one in the 'myIndex' index.

gold.user: User intends to clear all documents from the 'myIndex' index to reset the data for a new import.
gold.ideal: Successfully removes all documents from the 'myIndex' index.

gold.user: User wants to fetch documents from an external source and import them into the 'myIndex' index for better search capabilities.
gold.ideal: Successfully fetches and imports documents into the 'myIndex' index.

gold.user: User needs to delete multiple documents from the 'myIndex' index based on a list of document IDs to clean up outdated entries.
gold.ideal: Successfully removes the specified batch of documents from the 'myIndex' index.

gold.user: User wants to delete a specific document from the 'myIndex' index using its unique identifier to remove outdated information.
gold.ideal: Successfully removes the specified document from the 'myIndex' index.

gold.user: User needs to retrieve a specific document with ID '12345' from the 'myIndex' index to display detailed information on the product page.
gold.ideal: Returns the document with ID '12345' from the 'myIndex' index.

gold.user: User wants to delete the document with ID '12345' from the 'myIndex' index as it is no longer relevant.
gold.ideal: Successfully removes the document with ID '12345' from the 'myIndex' index.
